DataElement.preferredName: Mayo Staging System for AL Amyloidosis Initial Study Registration Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response that determines the stage at initial study registration as per the Mayo Staging System for AL Amyloidosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Mayo Staging System for AL Amyloidosis Initial Study Registration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A grading system for cardiac involvement in light chain (AL) amyloidosis. It uses serum levels of cardiac troponins (troponin T or I), brain natriuretic peptide (BNP) or its N-terminal propeptide (NT-ProBNP), and the difference between involved and uninvolved free light chains (dFLC) to assess the degree of cardiac muscle injury.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The act of enrolling an individual into a study.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Mayo Staging System for AL Amyloidosis

It uses serum levels of cardiac troponins (troponin T or I), brain natriuretic peptide (BNP) or its N-terminal propeptide (NT-ProBNP), and the difference between involved and uninvolved free light chains (dFLC) to assess the degree of cardiac muscle injury.
